name: Dark Knight Adventure
description:
A dark knight is not strange with people. However, do you know how to make the great knight?
A knight not only know how to fight, he must know how to avoid the meanless fight.
Let see how a knight become stronger and know him.

Great Feature:
+ More than 40+ puzzle to solve in 3 chapters
+ 3 different kinds and move monsters
+ Get all star to pass the maze with high score
+ Easy to pass but hard to fully complete.
